Class SceneManager

java.lang.Object
This_Package_Is_Cursed_Do_Not_Ever_Try_To_Change_Name_Or_It_Will_Explode.SceneManager
public class SceneManager extends Object
Manages the transitions between different scenes in the JavaFX application.

This class handles switching between the Main Menu, the Tutorial, and the active Battlefield game view. It also manages background music playback appropriate for each scene.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    SceneManager(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, GameController gameController)
    Initializes the SceneManager with the primary stage and game controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • SceneManager

      public SceneManager(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, GameController gameController)
      Initializes the SceneManager with the primary stage and game controller.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The main JavaFX stage.
      gameController - The controller managing game logic.

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Displays the main menu scene. Stops battle BGM and plays menu BGM.

    • showBattlefield

      public void showBattlefield()
      Displays the battlefield scene and starts the game. Resets the game state, stops menu BGM, and plays battle BGM.

    • showTutorial

      public void showTutorial()
      Displays the tutorial scene. Stops battle BGM.

    • returnToMenu

      public void returnToMenu()
      Helper method to return to the main menu (alias for showMenu).
